Blog.post: um today was sunday, I woke up and found out that there was a free show at downtown records, the end......................FUCK I HATE LIFE Picture: ----------------------------

Today is wednesday, and i cant wait untill the weekend its all i look forward to and its all the motive I have for trying hard through out the week, so that I can actually go somewhere, theres not that many places to go this weekend but theres a free show at the gate saturday night that im going to theres not that many good bands playing but symphony no. 9 is good so im going and anyone who would like to go should go to..... Pictures: ---------------------------------------- This is Mick, if he were made completly out of a sketch drawing, but hes not so stop fucking dreaming!! The reason I keep living...........

You are "Waste of Paint". You can be a very over analyzing person and you are sort of lost. You aren't really sure where you're going with your life but for now you hold some hope that you will indeed get to where you are going. Oh yeah, and that thing called "love", you feel it's just a game of chance. A game you are not good at. urlLink Which BRIGHT EYES song are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Finally the weekend....., the only thing good that came out of today was listening to paul play acustic at lunch to try to drowned out the only damn 5 rap songs theyve played at lunch for the past week....so im looking forward to go to the gate tonight everysong is a revolution is playing so its good and then the free show at bam bams tommorow night is going to be a cool "Dance Partay".... :) popo brute is playing, so im looking forward to that, I have some picture of popo brute playing at the gate check them out.. I don't know why I do this because every day is pretty much the same as the last one accept I might be getting a keyboard, witch is exiting because its for The Sexing, witch is the only desire I have in my life right now, yeah so I guess all I can do is wait for some good shows this weekend............. Oh, here is a goofy picture of Dan who is also in The Sexing, and a lyrics from a band that you should know of.... Picture: ------------------------------------ Lyric: ------------------------------------ There is nothing for which I am responsible. Just this baggage that I keep carrying on as if I had someone. OK, maybe there is a woman somewhere who's still thinking of me or a girl with coal black hair who's haunted in her dreams. But what they've seen, well, it wasn't me. It was just some lie that they slept beside. I kept this from them but I can't keep this from you. So will you look for me in that strange, bright place. Where the statues bloom in the park. They don't need no rain. Because how I ever got to you I have no idea. It's like some secret door, well it just appeared. So, no matter what I do from now on with my time. you will always stay here in my mind. I am certain of this and I am not certain of anything. So I want to get myself attached to something bolted down, So that these winds of circumstance won't keep blowing me around. To when I land to when I leave there is enough time to sleep and sing. I keep running when all I want is to lay motionless.
Im going to listen to bright eyes untill I grow old and die...

I like this song.......... Let me take you down, ’cause I’m going to strawberry fields. Nothing is real and nothing to get hungabout. Strawberry fields forever. Living is easy with eyes closed, misunderstanding all you see. It’s getting hard to be someone but it all works out, it doesn’t matter much to me. Let me take you down, ’cause I’m going to strawberry fields. Nothing is real and nothing to get hungabout. Strawberry fields forever. No one I think is in my tree, I mean it must be high or low. That is you can’t you know tune in but it’s all right, that is I think it’s not too bad. Let me take you down, ’cause I’m going to strawberry fields. Nothing is real and nothing to get hungabout. Strawberry fields forever. Always, no sometimes, think it’s me, but you know I know when it’s a dream. I think I know I mean a ’yes’ but it’s all wrong, that is I think I disagree. Let me take you down, ’cause I’m going to strawberry fields. Nothing is real and nothing to get hungabout. Strawberry fields forever. Strawberry fields forever.

Today was any other boring day, except there was a "fight" with was nothing new at east Bakersfield high school let me tell ya. Same old periods..Same old lunch same gay pickle ball at P.E. with Mr. triggs, if you don't know who Mr triggs is hes a P.E. teacher with no calf muscle yeah im sorry but one of the requirements for a P.E. teacher should be to have TWO CALF MUSCLES, if you cannot run....Your not hired...But that's just my opinion im sure they didn't have many pe teachers wanting to teach at east.

Well, i know that i really didnt want a live journal but my good friend micks seems like he wants me to have one so for his benefit im gonna get one even though there really confusing he said he'll get me started with one, so i doubt i'll be posting here anymore, i might but i dont really have much to say i can barly fill one let alone two, if i did it would be just repeating whatever is in here, so as soon as i get the name and everything going the way i want, i'll post the link here, but untill there no more posts untill i get this livejournal thing going, so yeah..as a famouse philosopher once said "Its been nice but not realy nice!"-Dan Diaz

Its summer, and um yeah i hate school yet its still somewhere to go cause i now got droped from summer school so i really have no way of getting anywhere, untill I get a car, but untill then....im stuck here writing bullshit in this thing, but hopefully i will get to go to lollapalooza i will be a very happy person..but i dont like giving my hopes up for anything cause then you dont get disapointed, i'll post the line up for lollapalooza i have an image, it works most of the time, but yeah i really never have anything to say so most of the time im gonna be posting photography in here, cause i enjoy that, at least i would if I had a good camera..too bad :( Pictures: ------------------------------------------- Lollapalooza Line-up

Broken the law: Yes Ran away from home: yes Snuck out of the house: yes, of course Ever gone skinny dipping: psshh HAVE I EVER GONE SKINNY DIPPING, pssh HAVE I EVER GONE SKINNY DIPPING......................yeah, no... Ever tipped over a porta potty: i tried but failed cause there heavy Used your parents' credit card before: my mom doesnt own one Fell alseep in shower/bath: yes, didnt drown though, too bad Been in a school play: i was once in 6th grade but that doesnt really count cause it was for D.A.R.E l o v e boy/girlfriend: dont have one Children:... People i enjoy being around, or people i really care about, not family, if thats what your thinking What makes you happiest: well...i havent found it yet but i'll let you know What's the next CD you're gonna get: the cure cd w h e n / w h a t w a s t h e l a s t Time you cried: thats confedential, but probably when i was drunk Time you got a real letter: No one writes letters anymore but if someone wrote me a letter it would be much appreciated since that actually took time, instead of email, but i dont get emails either so if i got one i couldnt complain Time you got e-mail: i dont Thing you purchased: keyboard Movie you saw in the theater: Harry Potter y o u r t h o u g h t s o n Abortion: Depends on the situation Teen smoking: shouldnt it be my thoughts on smoking period...cause adult smoking isnt any better, buts it your choice, smoking makes you relaxed, and it can kill you.. Spice girls: i dont even have a retort Dreams: i dream alot of almost having what i want but never achieving it i think thats something about being insecure, sorry to go all phyciatrist on you, difinitally not a english teach cause i dont think i spelt that right

well i still havent got my livejounal up so untill i do im gonna still post on here, because mick is suppose to help me in person, because those things can get difficult.... yeah right now im grounded for drinking to much and getting alcohol poisening and going to the hospital i might get suspended liecence for a year but hopefully the D.A. doesnt press charges so i wont get anything, but ive sobered up since then, and am doing pretty ok with out all the substances and what not..
